attributes.action: change the planning regulations which are tilted against local communities and in favour of corporations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are an organisation in Glasgow, consisting of three residents groups. We are getting a phone mast with 40m of housing mainly for elderly people and within a park used by children.

Unfortunately planning is not allowed to take health issues into consideration and I argue that the publics health should over - ride any other consideration.

All our councillors are against this mast Our MP and MSP are against it and all the local people so why is it going ahead?
